Subject: Port 587 is set to HTTP instead of SMTP by default
Description: Port 587 is set to HTTP instead of SMTP by default. According to documentation it should be set to SMTP. Was wondering why that is the configuration by default.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Go in the UI to Content Aware Protection - Deep Packet Inspection - Predefined Ports
What_We_Know__c:
- Asked for clarifications from the customer regarding his query
- checked on our side if indeed it is a bug
- raise a case to R&D to correct the issue
Next_Steps__c:

- waiting for R&D to finish their investigation
